column4: It's a really really really bad idea from any point of view to be logged in as root. Why exactly do you want to do it? Is the goal to compromise the system as much as possible...?
mobi-sheep:  I just want to know I am able to do such thing or if able then what's the way
mobi-sheep:  I know ita bad idea but I want to do
Well... I can't help you. It's just... It's like asking an artist how to best ruin a masterpiece. *runs off*
